attributes.action: David Cameron must resign from his position as Prime minister .
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron must resign from his position as Prime minister as it is untenable....his government under his leadership has failed , and the UK is in a mess with the wealthy and political elite getting tax cuts whilst the disabled and poor get penalised. And now with the panama papers being leaked and David Camerons late father and other torys names being involved ....its time for change , its time to take back Britain from the greedy wealthy elite. More children than ever before are in poverty , the nhs is being sold under our noses and the United Kingdom of Great Britain is no longer united or great.
attributes.background: David Cameron must resign from his position as Prime minister as it is untenable....his government under his leadership has failed .

rejection.details: The resignation of the Prime Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
